Hardware

PCB milling

Let me know if you want to mill your own circuit board!
Check PCB section of week 13 to get started.

3D printers

We have three 3D printers in house! Let me know if you have a file you want to print during the class. I can print them and go over how to use the printers.

Here is a website for sea of public 3d files
For 3D modeling softwares, check out 3D medeling and printing section on week 13
